mapper.select: /* prjframework.common.file.service.PrjframeworkCmmnFileService.CmmnFileService_S01 */ SELECT B.APND_FILE_NM AS ATCHMNFL_NM, B.APND_FILE_SAVE_NM AS ATCHMNFL_STRE_NM, B.APND_FILE_SIZE AS ATCHMNFL_MG FROM NWRK210TL A, NWRK211TL B WHERE A.APND_FILE_NO = B.APND_FILE_NO AND A.APND_FILE_NO = #{atchmnflNo} ORDER BY APND_FILE_SN ASC
mapper.insert: /* prjframework.common.file.service.PrjframeworkCmmnFileService.CmmnFileService_I01 */ INSERT INTO NWRK210TL ( APND_FILE_NO, WRT_PN_NO, WRT_PN_IP, WRT_DTTM, UPDT_PN_NO, UPDT_PN_IP, UPDT_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{atchmnflNo}, #{wrtPnNo}, #{wrtPnIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{wrtPnNo}, #{wrtPnIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )

/* prjframework.common.file.service.PrjframeworkCmmnFileService.CmmnFileService_I02 */ INSERT INTO NWRK211TL ( APND_FILE_SN, APND_FILE_NO, APND_FILE_NM, APND_FILE_SAVE_NM, APND_FILE_SIZE, WRT_PN_NO, WRT_PN_IP, WRT_DTTM, UPDT_PN_NO, UPDT_PN_IP, UPDT_DTTM ) VALUES ( NVL((SELECT MAX(APND_FILE_SN) + 1 FROM NWRK211TL WHERE APND_FILE_NO = #{atchmnflNo}), 1), #{atchmnflNo}, #{atchmnflNm}, #{atchmnflStreNm}, #{atchmnflMg}, #{wrtPnNo}, #{wrtPnIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{wrtPnNo}, #{wrtPnIp}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
